Name: 引力魔方(Gravity rubik's cube)
About the game: ** Game introduction ** -- Gravity Cube is a third-person action shooter game developed independently based on Unity engine. The scene structure is in a space where gravity is out of control. Players will play their roles in the game and fight with AI robots in the face of complex and changeable game scenes and constantly changing game mechanisms in the Cube. {STEAM_APP_IMAGE} / extras / 1111 JPG [/]
